name: Heaven for Death
storyline:
I lost all my memories and met a strange angel in heaven.
She named me 'Ryo' and we try to accomplish a mission together.
Together we try to fulfill a mission. ......"
summary:
A fangame from "Bocchi the Rock!" series made in RPG Maker.
Ryou is dead and amnesiac and Nijika is her angel. Together they're in heaven.
